trigger.Name: trTutotialStart
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
EnableAutoHelp( false )
local b = SpawnMessageBox( "196" ) if b == 1 then EnableAutoHelp( true ) ShowHelp( "HELP_ID_MAIN_GAME_INTERFACE" ) end

trigger.Name: trBooksBurn
trigger.script:
AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( "fm_player_add_thing", "forb_books")
local rrr = GetEntityByName ("forb_books") if rrr then rrr:Remove() end
AddQuestItem("forb_books")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trSpawnMestEd
trigger.script:
CreateTeam ("MestEd", 1101, CVector(getPos("MestEd_loc")), {"Scout01", "Scout02"}, nil, nil, nil) CreateTeam ("MestBandits", 1105, CVector(getPos("MestBandits_loc")), {"r1m1_sml03", "r1m1_sml03", "r1m1_sml02", "r1m1_sml04"}, nil, nil, nil)
local edteam = GetEntityByName ("MestEd") if edteam then edteam:SetDestination(CVector(getPos("MestBandits_loc"))) edteam:SetCruisingSpeed(100) edteam:SetReactingOnDisturbingVehicles(false) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: triggerExitToMap72
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
local b = SpawnMessageBox(197) if b == 1 then PassToMap("sin", "FromR7M1", -1 )
GetPlayerVehicle():AddModifier( "fuel", "- "..random(0.5*GetPlayerFuel()) ) else SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
FlyAround(1, 0, 25, 2, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate ("RolikExitToMap72") TActivate ("RolikENDExitToMap72") end
